settings.content: Keep your SIJO bedding looking and feeling its best with our comprehensive care guide. Our eucalyptus-based products are designed for easy maintenance and lasting comfort.

settings.title: Cold Water Wash
settings.content: Always use cold water (30°C/86°F or below) to preserve fiber integrity and prevent shrinkage.

settings.title: Gentle Detergent
settings.content: Use mild, eco-friendly detergent. Avoid bleach, fabric softener, or harsh chemicals.

settings.title: Gentle Cycle
settings.content: Select gentle or delicate cycle to protect the natural fibers and maintain softness.

settings.title: Proper Loading
settings.content: Wash similar colors together and don't overload the machine for best results.

Tumble Dry Low: Use low heat setting to prevent shrinkage and maintain fabric integrity. High heat can damage eucalyptus fibers.

Remove Promptly: Take items out as soon as they're dry to prevent wrinkles and over-drying.

Air Drying Option: For best longevity, air dry when possible. Hang or lay flat in a well-ventilated area away from direct sunlight.

Dryer Balls: Use wool dryer balls to reduce static and drying time naturally.

Avoid: High heat, over-drying, and dryer sheets which can coat fibers and reduce absorbency.

Sheet Sets & Pillowcases

  • Wash before first use to enhance softness
  • Separate light and dark colors for first few washes
  • Turn pillowcases inside out to protect the surface
  • Iron on low heat if desired, while slightly damp

Comforters & Duvets

  • Use large capacity washer or visit laundromat
  • Add tennis balls or dryer balls to maintain loft
  • May require longer drying time - check thoroughly
  • Fluff regularly to redistribute filling

Loungewear

  • Turn garments inside out before washing
  • Wash similar weights together
  • Hang or lay flat to dry when possible
  • Steam or iron on low if needed

settings.title: Food & Drink Stains
settings.content: Blot immediately, rinse with cold water, pre-treat with gentle stain remover before washing.

settings.title: Body Oil & Sweat
settings.content: Pre-treat with enzyme detergent, wash in cold water with extra rinse cycle.

settings.title: Makeup & Cosmetics
settings.content: Use makeup remover or gentle dish soap, work from outside in, rinse thoroughly.

settings.title: General Stains
settings.content: Act quickly, test cleaning method on hidden area first, avoid harsh scrubbing.

Proper Storage:

  • Store in cool, dry place with good air circulation
  • Use breathable cotton storage bags, avoid plastic
  • Add cedar blocks or lavender sachets for freshness
  • Rotate bedding sets to ensure even use

Seasonal Care:

  • Wash before storing for extended periods
  • Check stored items periodically for any issues
  • Refresh stored bedding with a quick tumble in dryer
  • Wash again before returning to regular use

Daily Maintenance:

  • Make bed daily to allow moisture to evaporate
  • Flip pillows and rotate regularly for even wear
  • Air out bedding weekly by pulling back covers
  • Wash pillows every 3-6 months

✓ DO

  • Wash before first use
  • Use cold water always
  • Choose gentle cycles
  • Remove promptly from dryer
  • Follow care label instructions
  • Pre-treat stains immediately
  • Use eco-friendly detergents
  • Air dry when possible

✗ DON'T

  • Use hot water or high heat
  • Add fabric softener or bleach
  • Overload washing machine
  • Iron on high heat
  • Dry clean (unless specified)
  • Store in plastic bags
  • Ignore stains or spills
  • Over-dry in machine

Following proper care instructions helps maintain your product warranty and ensures you get the most from your SIJO bedding investment.

Warranty Coverage:

  • Manufacturing defects are covered under our warranty
  • Proper care maintains warranty validity
  • Keep care instructions and purchase receipts
  • Contact us immediately if you notice any defects

What Voids Warranty:

  • Damage from improper care or cleaning
  • Use of harsh chemicals or bleach
  • Excessive heat damage
  • Normal wear and tear over time
